CHECKER_SUCCESS: Aikin ka yayi kyau! An wuce.
FIRST_LESSON_MESSAGE: Kana kallon darasi na farko a wannan bangaren.
FINISH_LESSON_MESSAGE: Dole ne ka gama dukkan ayyuka kafin ka kammala!
COURSE_COMPLETE_MESSAGE: Murna! Ka kammala duk darussa na wannan bangaren.
JS_BEGINNER_DESC: Koyi JavaScript daga tushe zuwa matsayi — mataki-mataki tare da kalubale masu kayatarwa!
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_DESC:
Darasin Asalin JavaScript
JavaScript harshe ne na shirye-shiryen kwamfuta wanda yake baka damar sarrafa kwamfuta.

◉ Sharhi (Comments) Don ka rubuta bayanin da kwamfuta ba za ta aiwatar ba, ka yi amfani da //. 
// Sharhi yana farawa da //
// Kwamfuta ba ta aiwatar da duk abin da ya fara da //
// Wannan domin kai ne ka gane abin da karka rubuta yake yi

◉ Nuna Rubutu da Lambobi Don sa kwamfuta ta nuna rubutu, yi amfani da console.log():
console.log("Welcome")
Don nuna lamba:
console.log(100)

◉ Canje-canje (Variables) Don ajiye rubutu ko lamba, yi amfani da let:
let name = "Ali";
let age = 20;

◉ Ayyuka (Functions) Wannan aikin yana tara lambobi biyu:
function add(a, b) {
   return a + b;
}
Don kiran aikin:
let result = add(x, y);

◉ Yanayin Sharadi (Condition Statements) Misali da if da else:
let a = 20;
let b = 2;

if (a > b) {
   console.log("a is greater than b")
} else {
    console.log("a is less than b")
}

◉ Jeri (Arrays) Don ajiye abubuwa masu yawa, yi amfani da array:
let myeggs = [];
Tare da ƙimar farko:
let ages = [10, 22];
let shelf = ["book", "fruit", "bottle"];
Don samun abu daga ciki:
console.log(ages[1]); // 10
console.log(shelf[2]); // bottle
Tsawon array:
console.log(myeggs.length);
console.log(shelf.length);

◉ Zagaye (Loops) Maimaiciwa da zagaye for...of:
for (let drawer of shelf) {
    console.log(drawer);
}

JavaScript harshe ne mai tasowa da yalwar fasali da za ka ci gaba da koya a darussa masu zuwa.
A wannan darasin, ka koyi menene JavaScript tare da cikakken taƙaitaccen bayani game da harshen.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_1_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta yi gaisuwa da nuna 'Assalam Alaykum'.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_1_INITIAL: // TODO: Sa kwamfuta ta yi gaisuwa
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_1_HINT_1: Yi amfani da console.log() don nuna rubutu.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_2_INITIAL: // TODO: Sa kwamfuta ta ce sunanta
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_2_HINT_1: Yi amfani da console.log() kamar yadda ka yi baya.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_2_HINT_3: Rubuta jumlar daidai a cikin alamun zance.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_DESC: Ajiye sunan kwamfuta da shekarunta cikin canje-canje.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_HINT_1: Yi amfani da let don kirkirar canje-canje.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_HINT_2: Yi amfani da = wajen bada kima.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_HINT_3: Rubutu a cikin alamun zance, lambobi ba sa bukata.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_DESC: Ajiye abubuwa a kabad ɗakin kwana, kabadan kicin, da lambobin sadarwa.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_INITIAL: // TODO: Ƙirƙirar arrays don kabad da lambobin sadarwa
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_HINT_1: Yi amfani da [] don ƙirƙirar array.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_HINT_3: Lambobi ba sa buƙatar alamun zance, rubutu yana bukata.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta kwatanta shekarunta da naka ta nuna sakon da ya dace.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_HINT_1: Yi amfani da if, else if, da else.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_HINT_2: Yi amfani da == don kwatanta daidaito, ba = ba.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_HINT_3: console.log() zai nuna sakonni daban-daban dangane da shekaru.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta faɗi sunanta sau 5 ta amfani da zagaye.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_INITIAL:
// TODO: Maimaaita sako sau 5
let computername = 'Komputa';
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_HINT_2: Fara i da 0, ci gaba yayin i < 5, ƙara i bayan kowane zagaye.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_HINT_3: Yi amfani da + don haɗa rubutu da canje-canje.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta nuna duk abubuwan da ke cikin kabadan ɗaki ta amfani da zagaye.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_HINT_1: Yi amfani da for...of wajen zagayawa a array.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_HINT_3: Za ka iya kiran abu drawer ko duk sunan da kake so.
JS_BEGINNER_TASK_8_DESC: Nuna jimillar abubuwan da ke cikin kowane kabad da lambobin sadarwa.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_DESC: Koyi DialectScript — da kadan da kadan!
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_0_DESC:
Darasin Asali na DialectScript
DialectScript harshen shirye-shirye ne wanda ke baka damar shirya kwamfuta.

◉ Sharhi Don sa kwamfuta ta dauki bayanin lura, yi amfani da //. 
// Sharhi yana farawa da //
// Kwamfuta ba ta aiwatar da abin da ya fara da //
// Wannan kawai don ka yi sharhi akan abin da lambarka ke yi

◉ Nuna Rubutu da Lambobi Don sa kwamfuta ta nuna rubutu, yi amfani da rubuta():
rubuta("Sannu da zuwa")
Don nuna lambobi:
rubuta(100)

◉ Canje-canje (Variables) Don adana rubutu ko lambobi, yi amfani da madadi:
madadi suna = "Ali";
madadi shekara = 20;

◉ Aiki Wannan aikin yana hada lambobi biyu:
aiki add(a, b) {
   return a + b;
}
Don kiran aikin:
madadi result = add(x, y);

◉ Jimillar Sharudda (Condition Statements) Misali da amfani da idan da kokuma:
madadi a = 20;
madadi b = 2;

idan (a > b) {
   rubuta("a ya fi b girma")
} kokuma {
    rubuta("a ya kasa b")
}

◉ Jerin Abubuwa (Arrays) Don adana abubuwa da dama, yi amfani da arrays:
madadi myeggs = [];
Tare da ƙimar farko:
madadi shekaru = [10, 22];
madadi shelf = ["littafi", "’ya’yan itace", "bottle"];
Samun ƙima:
rubuta(shekaru[1]); // 10
rubuta(shelf[2]); // bottle
Girman array:
rubuta(myeggs.tsawo);
rubuta(shelf.tsawo);

◉ Maimaici (Loops) Maimaicin ayyuka da faraDaga..kowanef loop:
faraDaga (madadi drawer kowane shelf) {
    rubuta(drawer);
}

DialectScript harshen shirye-shirye ne mai tasowa da ke da abubuwa masu yawa da za ku gano a darussan gaba.
A cikin wannan darasin, kun koyi menene DialectScript kuma kun sami ra’ayi game da harshen DialectScript.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_1_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta gaishe mai amfani ta hanyar nuna 'Assalam Alaykum'.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_1_HINT_1: Yi amfani da rubuta() don nuna rubutu.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_1_HINT_2: Rubutun dole ne ya kasance a cikin magana.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_2_INITIAL: // TODO: Sa kwamfuta ta fadi sunanta
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_DESC: Ajiye sunan kwamfuta da shekararta a cikin canje-canje.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_HINT_1: Yi amfani da madadi don kirkirar canje-canje.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_3_HINT_3: Rubutu yana cikin magana, lambobi ba su cikin magana.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_DESC: Ajiye abubuwa a kabad ɗakin, kabad ɗin kicin, da lambobin sadarwa.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_INITIAL: // TODO: Kirkirar arrays don kabad da lambobin sadarwa
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_HINT_1: Yi amfani da [] don kirkirar arrays.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_4_HINT_3: Lambobi ba sa bukatar magana, rubutu yana bukatar magana.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_DESC: Nemi kwamfuta ta kwatanta shekararta da taka sannan ta nuna saƙo.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_HINT_1: Yi amfani da idan, kokuma idan, kokuma don sharudda.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_HINT_2: Yi amfani da == don kwatanta daidai, ba = ba
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_5_HINT_3: rubuta() na iya nuna saƙonni daban-daban gwargwadon shekaru.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta fadi sunanta sau 5 ta amfani da loop.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_INITIAL:
// TODO: Maimaici saƙo sau 5
madadi computersuna = 'Komputer';
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_HINT_2: Fara i daga 0, ci gaba yayin da i < 5, kara i a kowane lokaci.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_6_HINT_3: Yi amfani da + don hada rubutu da canje-canje.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_DESC: Sa kwamfuta ta nuna duk abubuwan da ke cikin kabad ɗakin ta amfani da loop.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_HINT_1: Yi amfani da faraDaga...kowane loop don wucewa cikin array.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_HINT_2: Duk wani abu cikin array za a iya bugawa ta rubuta()
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_7_HINT_3: Za ka iya kira kowanne abu 'drawer' ko wani suna.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_8_DESC: Nuna adadin abubuwa a kowane kabad da lambobin sadarwa.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_8_HINT_1: Yi amfani da array.tsawo don samun yawan abubuwa.
AJMJS_BEGINNER_TASK_8_HINT_2: Hada rubutu da lambobi ta amfani da +
